H1.text: Hair color is an acquired trait.

H3.text: Eye shape is an acquired trait.

A4.text: Mental traits are acquired by learning and adapting native traits to the environment of the individual.

A5.text: While changes in eye appearance (and function, and structure) that occur because of acquired characteristics like injury, illness, old age, or malnutrition are definitely acquired characteristics

A8.text: Rich, detailed documentation of language acquisition in ASL

A9.text: Babies Learn to Recognize Words in the Womb
